\w And|strong="H0398"\w* she \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* out \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w* whelps, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w he|strong="H0259"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w lion|strong="H3715"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w he|strong="H0259"\w* \w learned|strong="H3925"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* catch \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w took|strong="H8610"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w but|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* without receiving wounds: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* chains \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* herself weakened, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* \w was|strong="H0259"\w* \w lost|strong="H0006"\w*, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w young|strong="H3715"\w* \w lions|strong="H3715"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w lion|strong="H3715"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w up|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w down|strong="H1980"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w lions|strong="H0738"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w learned|strong="H3925"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* catch \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* Game \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H5439"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w net|strong="H7568"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* wounds \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H5414"\w* \w taken|strong="H8610"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w cage|strong="H5474"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* chains \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* prison, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w should|strong="H0413"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w planted|strong="H8362"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6509"\w* \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w branches|strong="H6058"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w grown|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* she hath \w strong|strong="H5797"\w* \w rods|strong="H4294"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w make|strong="H7200"\w* sceptres \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* bear \w rule|strong="H4910"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w stature|strong="H6967"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w exalted|strong="H1361"\w* \w among|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w branches|strong="H1808"\w*: \w and|strong="H7200"\w* she \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w height|strong="H6967"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w branches|strong="H1808"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5428"\w* she \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w plucked|strong="H5428"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w burning|strong="H0784"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w dried|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*: \w her|strong="H0398"\w* \w strong|strong="H5797"\w* \w rods|strong="H4294"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w withered|strong="H3001"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w dried|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w*: \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* hath \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* she \w is|strong="H0776"\w* transplanted \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* passable, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w dry|strong="H6723"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w* \w branches|strong="H4294"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*: \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* hath \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w strong|strong="H5797"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w rulers|strong="H4910"\w*. \w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w lamentation|strong="H7015"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w lamentation|strong="H7015"\w*.
